description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the PowerShell elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-38046), you need to apply the respective security updates to your Windows systems:

1. Identify your Windows version and corresponding build number.
2. Download and install the appropriate KB articles from the Microsoft Update Catalog. 

**Details**:
The following updates address this vulnerability:
- Windows 11 Version 24H2 (KB5043080) 
- Windows 11 Version 23H2 (KB5043076) 
- Windows 11 Version 22H2 (KB5043067) 
- Windows 10 Versions with respective KB articles (KB5043083 and KB5043064).

For manual installation, download the update packages from:
- [KB5043080](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043080)
- [KB5043076](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043076)
- [KB5043067](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043067)
- [KB5043083](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043083)
- [KB5043064](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043064).

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure to backup your data before updating the system. 
- Confirm that your system matches the build numbers compatible with the patches.
